descriptors.fluency_coherence: Fluent with only very occasional repetition or self-correction. Hesitation may occasionally occur to find words.
descriptors.pronunciation: Uses wide range of phonological features. Can sustain appropriate rhythm.
descriptors.lexical_resource: Wide resource, readily used to discuss all topics. Skilful use of less common items.
descriptors.grammatical_range_accuracy: Wide range of structures, flexibly used. Majority of sentences error-free.

feedback.fluency_coherence: Excellent fluency. Speech flows naturally with minimal hesitation.
feedback.pronunciation: Clear pronunciation. Speech is easily understood with consistent clarity.
feedback.lexical_resource: Wide and flexible vocabulary. Uses 5 advanced vocabulary items effectively. Strong command of less common items.
feedback.grammatical_range_accuracy: Good grammatical control. Mostly accurate structures. 0 errors in complex sentences.
feedback.overall_recommendation: Strong performance across all criteria. Ready for advanced academic/professional contexts.

action_plan.instruction: Practice steady pacing using metronome or rhythm drills.
Replace filler words with silent pauses under 300 ms.
